se.rupy.http
Class Daemon

java.lang.Object
  se.rupy.http.Daemon
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Daemon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A tiny HTTP daemon. The whole server is non-static so that you can easily setup multiple HTTP server in one application on different ports.

Author:
marc

Constructor Detail

Daemon

public Daemon(java.lang.String pass,
              int port,
              int threads,
              int timeout,
              int cookie,
              int delay,
              int size,
              boolean verbose,
              boolean debug)
Use this to start the daemon from your application.

Parameters:
pass - the pass used to deploy services via HTTP POST or null/"" to disable remote hot-deploy
port - which TCP port
threads - how many threads
timeout - session timeout in seconds or 0 to disable sessions
cookie - session key length; default and minimum is 4, > 10 can be considered secure
delay - time in seconds before active query/reply drops the connection due to inactivity
size - IO buffer size, should be proportional to the data sizes received/sent by the server currently this is input/output buffer sizes, chunk length and max header size! :P
verbose -
